programme.desc: It tells the story of a woman whose love for and obsession with her daughter borders on harmful and toxic behavior.

programme.title: Prinsesa Ng City Jail
programme.desc: The story will follow Princess, who grows up inside the city jail along with jail guards. While searching for her real family, she will be helped by a new inmate, Xavier.

programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: Pag-ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Pusoy Dos
programme.desc: It is non-stop laughter as Janno Gibbs and Dennis Padilla got together as Billy and Jack, modern-day Robin Hoods who engaged in petty scums to earn money for the upkeep of a day care center for indigent children.

programme.title: Macario Durano
programme.desc: When a corrupt police captain and his henchmen framed up Durano for a crime he did not commit. He then escaped from prison with revenge foremost in his mind.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as \"bad boy\" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Pikoy Goes to Malaysia
programme.desc: Tribal customs commands Pikoy to get married. But the union is against his will. He neglects his bride and humiliates his family. As punishment, he is banished from the tribe and forbidden to speak until he is ready to submit himself to the rules.

programme.title: Lipa \"Arandia\" Massacre
programme.desc: In the movie, Vilma played the role of Helen Arandia, who was brutally murdered along with her two daughters in Lipa, Batangas. The movie is not a massacre movie per se but which main thrust is on the beautiful love story of the couple.

programme.title: Send in the Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Bahala Na VS Sputnik
programme.desc: \"Bahala na\" and \"Sigue-Sigue Sputnik\" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Markadong Hudas
programme.desc: Daniel Braganza,a leading hatchetman of a crime syndicate.He was a killer totally bereft of conscience that he earned the nickname \"Markadong Hudas\".
